abstract: Mitchells stores, a Connecticut clothier to hedge funds and corporate chiefs, sees its California counterpart as the path to growth, Bloomberg News reports.
snippet: Mitchells stores, a Connecticut clothier to hedge funds and corporate chiefs, sees its California counterpart as the path to growth, Bloomberg News reports.
lead_paragraph: Mitchells stores , a Connecticut clothier to hedge funds and corporate chiefs, prospered with Wall Street until the financial crisis battered sales. Now, the group sees its California counterpart as the path to growth, Bloomberg News reports.
